summary: Most frontend structure appears to implement the 5-page site with shared header/footer, responsive navigation, SEO helper, and a wired contact form with client-side validation. The backend persists contact entries but does not meet the required data fields (missing mobile and timestamp) and introduces extra, unrequested authentication scaffolding and an admin-like retrieval API.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend stores submissions with at least: name, mobile, email, message, and a timestamp.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend ContactEntry type includes only name, email, and message; it does not store mobile or any timestamp field.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider scaffolding added to the app (AuthClient, identity context, actor switching based on identity).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says authentication is not required; Internet Identity should only be used if auth is later added.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend query API to retrieve all contact form entries (admin-style access).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly include an admin dashboard for viewing contact submissions; providing a bulk retrieval endpoint is an admin-oriented feature and was not requested by any REQ.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a 'Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai' attribution link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria; adds extra branding/attribution content.
